slice-ansi

Slice a string with ANSI escape codes

Install

$ npm install --save slice-ansi

Usage

```js var chalk = require(‘chalk’); var sliceAnsi = require(‘slice-ansi’);

var input = ‘The quick brown ‘ + chalk.red(‘fox jumped over ‘) + ‘the lazy ‘ + chalk.green(‘dog and then ran away with the unicorn.’);

console.log(sliceAnsi(input, 20, 30)); ```

API

sliceAnsi(input, beginSlice[, endSlice])

input

Type: string

String with ANSI escape codes. Like one styled by chalk.

beginSlice

Type: number

The zero-based index at which to begin the slice.

endSlice

Type: number

Optional. The zero-based index at which to end the slice.
